description: Try our easy to follow Lychee & Watermelon with Mint Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit salad,Seafood free,Sesame free,Watermelon,Quick & easy dessert
name: Lychee & Watermelon with Mint Syrup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 16 fresh lychees, peeled and pitted (canned lychees can be used instead)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar and 1/2 cup water in a small saucepan and stir over medium heat until sugar dissolves.

Add shredded mint and leave to cool. Cut a large watermelon into slices. Divide between serving bowls and add peeled and pitted fresh lychees. Pour over syrup and garnish with mint leaves. Serve with scoops of vanilla ice cream.
